summary: Memorandum regarding the cover debriefing of Joseph S. Piccolo, who resigned from the Agency on 4 October 1961. Details his employment history, cover assignments in Mexico and Headquarters, and instructions for disclosing his employment. Includes his forwarding address and new employment information.
title: PICCOLO, Joseph S. GS-7, WH - Cover Debriefing
recipient: Chief, Records and Services Division, Office of Personnel
